Text: And heres the siteCousins and family Here is the address for the newest most exciting site on the Internet Well we hope it will become exciting It all depends on You All Ive registered the domain name Thatsnicecom I tried to get Thatsnicecom but it was already taken It leads to a nonpublic page so be careful when typing the URL Universal Resource Locater Type it as and you should get there OK Ronnie had trouble getting it right through her aol browser It finally worked by launching Explorer and entering the URL there Hows that for a novice only had computer three days Its now up to all of you to send me information and pictures to put on the page We need to keep it a World Class psite so I reserve the right to discard objectionable material Objectional may be defined as antiwhite antiblack antiasian antimale antifemale antiprolife antiprochoice antigay anti semitic antiyankee antirebel antiblonde antibrunette antiredhead antidemocrat anti republican or obscene materials well maybe not antirepublican You get the idea Lets just not put anything on here that may be offensive to others in the group I just checked to seewhat happens when mail is sent to anyone thatsnicecom The result it gets returned to sender Im going to get that fixed so it will ultimately get to me at For now please send any email to me at Ill try to get the stuff up on the site within a few days Please add to the mailing list Alan Nancy Barnett and Lara Barnett Hope this finds you all in good health Arnold
